R

Recipe - Class in pl.myrecipebasket.model
Object Recipe represents a recipe placed on an external web site that User finds worth storing for later use.
Recipe() - Constructor for class pl.myrecipebasket.model.Recipe
 
Recipe(String, String, String, Timestamp, int, int, boolean, List<Category>, User, List<Vote>, List<Comment>, List<User>) - Constructor for class pl.myrecipebasket.model.Recipe
 
RecipeController - Class in pl.myrecipebasket.web.controller
 
RecipeController() - Constructor for class pl.myrecipebasket.web.controller.RecipeController
 
recipeRemoved() - Method in class pl.myrecipebasket.web.controller.RecipeController
 
RecipeRepository - Interface in pl.myrecipebasket.repository
Object RecipeRepository provides access to database and ability to perform CRUD operations on Recipe database table.
RecipeService - Class in pl.myrecipebasket.service
Object RecipeService is a intermediate layer between persistence layer (RecipeRepository & UserRepository & CategoryRepository) and view layer (CommentController & HomeController & RecipeController & VoteController).
RecipeService() - Constructor for class pl.myrecipebasket.service.RecipeService
 
RecipeService.VoteComparator - Class in pl.myrecipebasket.service
Object VoyeComparator holds a comparison function that imposes order in which two Recipe object should be sorted.
recipeShared() - Method in class pl.myrecipebasket.web.controller.RecipeController

removeRecipe(Recipe) - Method in class pl.myrecipebasket.service.RecipeService
This method removes Recipe from MyRecipeBasket database.
removeRecipe(long, Model) - Method in class pl.myrecipebasket.web.controller.RecipeController
 
removeVote(Vote) - Method in class pl.myrecipebasket.model.User
 
Role - Class in pl.myrecipebasket.model
Object Role represents an authorization level that can be assigned to a User and defines what sort of actions User is allowed to undertake within MyRecipeBasket environment.
Role() - Constructor for class pl.myrecipebasket.model.Role
 
Role(String, String) - Constructor for class pl.myrecipebasket.model.Role
 
RoleRepository - Interface in pl.myrecipebasket.repository
Object RoleRepository provides access to database and ability to perform CRUD operations on Role database table.
RoleService - Class in pl.myrecipebasket.service
Object RoleService is a intermediate layer between persistence layer (RoleRepository) and view layer.
RoleService() - Constructor for class pl.myrecipebasket.service.RoleService
